name: Sting Operation
storyline:
"Hiya Jimmy! Wanna be cool like all the other kids?"

That's what the stranger said to Jimmy, and Jimmy should have walked away. But that is not what happened. Instead, Jimmy became the victim of a massive illegal drug cartel, and now a group of police officers must get involved and clean the streets of drugs!

Play as officers Penny, Emmy, Jenny, and Sir Benson Yorkshire Algernon Cholmondeley the 3rd, who set up sting operations across the city to stop the crime lords wreaking havoc on their once peaceful city.
summary: A Twist on the Arcade Pacman Formula! Use Real Time Strategy to command a group of police officers trying to catch criminals.
